Package com.codeforall.simplegraphics.graphics

package com.codeforall.simplegraphics.graphics
  • Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Singleton Canvas class responsible for managing and displaying graphical shapes.
    Color
    Represents a simple RGB color definition used for graphical shapes.
    Colorable
    Methods for modifying a shape color The color of the shape is used when drawing or filling
    Ellipse
    Represents an ellipse shape that can be drawn, filled, moved, and resized.
    Fillable
    Methods for filling a shape
    Line
    Represents a straight line defined by two endpoints.
    Movable
    Methods for moving a shape
    Rectangle
    The Rectangle class represents a drawable and optionally filled rectangle that can be displayed on a canvas.
    Shape
    A shape that can be drawn on a canvas.
    Text
    The Text class represents a drawable text label that can be displayed on a canvas.
